alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton; Pope (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 7:08PM CDT until July 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Johnson County in western Arkansas... Northeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dillen, or 13 miles south of Jasper, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dillen... Moore... Bertha... Smyrna... Ben Hur... Wayton... Crossroad... Swain... Gum Springs in Newton County... Deer... Cowell... Nail... Sand Gap... Lurton... Nogo... Treat... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
